data.text: “Kpɔ ɖa esiae nye nye dɔla si melé ɖe te,
Mafa avi alo ado ɣli
Maɖe aƒla ŋeŋe la ɖa o,
Maʋuʋu alo dzi naɖe le eƒo o
Ale Yehowa, Mawu, ame si wɔ dziƒo, eye wòhe eme,
“Nye, Yehowa, meyɔ wò le dzɔdzɔenyenye me.
be nàʋu ŋku na ŋkugbagbãtɔwo,
“Nyee nye Yehowa, ŋkɔnyee ma!
Kpɔ ɖa, blemanyawo va eme,
Mi ame siwo toa atsiaƒu dzi,
Gbegbe kple du siwo le afi ma nekɔ woƒe gbe dzi.
Wonetsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe na Yehowa,
Yehowa ado abe kalẽtɔ ene.
“Mezi kpi eteƒe didi,
Makaka towo kple togbɛwo,
Makplɔ ŋkugbagbãtɔwo ato mɔ si womenya tsã o la dzi,
Ke ame siwo ɖoa dzi ɖe aklamakpakpɛwo ŋu,
“Mi tokunɔwo, mise nu,
Ame kae tsi ŋku, eye wòku to
Èkpɔ nu geɖe, gake mètsɔ wo de ta me o,
Edze Yehowa ŋu le eƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye ta be,
Ke esia nye ame siwo woda adzoe, eye woha wo;
Mia dometɔ kae aɖo to nu sia
Ame kae de Yakob asi be wòazu nuhaha,
Eya ta wòtrɔ eƒe dɔmedzoe helĩhelĩ la
